questions.title: You search for pictures and data of your boyfriend on the Internet, and you find out...

options.text: ... he is a member of the Moonlighting Fan Club.
... a picture of him... taken in the XIX Century!
... he goes every year to the Zombie Walk... without costume.
... he has a history of legal or discipline troubles.
... he growls, howls and drools.
... his eyes goes yellow.
... he blames you for his anger.
... he wants to eat your brain!

questions.title: You are worry because in your boyfriend's room there are...

options.text: ... lots of Dracula's movie posters.
... lots of long and smelly hairs on the carpet, and crushed shirts in the closet.
... lots of empty Liquor bottles and beer cans all over the floor.
... lots of half eaten brains on the bed.

questions.title: Some friends of your boyfriend have warned you that he...

options.text: ... hates and fears sunny days.
... has no heart beats.
... used to walk on full moon nights.
... has a history of violent behaviors.

questions.title: A friend invites you both to his band's concert. Your boyfriend...

options.text: ... looks at your friend's head and says ''YUMMY...''.
... threatens him and commands him not to talk to you anymore.
... smells him, and scratches his ear.
... ask you if he need to bring his own blood.

questions.title: You are scared every time your boyfriend...

options.text: ... jumps from the top of a pine tree with you hanging on his back.
... insults you or call you names.
... comes back with his shirt crushed.
... chaces your cat and try to beat it.

questions.title: Your boyfriend can't find the remote control, then...

options.text: ... he looks at you and says ''BRAINS...''.
... he starts kicking everything and shouting out loud.
... he transforms into a bat and go to fly away.
... he howls to the moon.

questions.title: You have a new dress and you ask your boyfriend what he thinks about it.

options.text: ... He says you look bloody fanstatic.
... He says you look more beautiful than the moon.
... He orders you to change your clothes immediately.
... He says ''EAT BRAINS... HUNGRY''

questions.title: You are going to your Acting Class. Your boyfriend stops you and...

options.text: ... try to eat your brain (again).
... orders you not to go to that class... or else.
... tells you he is going to stay at home watching Dances with Wolves.
... kiss you goodbye and goes to his coffin to take a nap

questions.title: Tomorrow is your mother's birthday and there's going to be a party. Your boyfriend...

options.text: ... offers you to eat your mother brains.
... tells you that you can't go because he doesn't want to go.
... scratch an ear and keep watching Animal Planet.
... asks you what type of blood your family have.
